verses.verse: After <S%H310><s%> Abimelech <S%H40><s%> there arose <S%H6965><s%> to save <S%H3467><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> Tola <S%H8439><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Puah, <S%H6312><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Dodo, <S%H1734><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> of Issachar; <S%H3485><s%> and he lived <S%H3427><s%> in Shamir <S%H8069><s%> in the hill <S%H2022><s%> country of Ephraim. <S%H669><s%>
He judged <S%H8199><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> - three <S%H7969><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and died, <S%H4191><s%> and was buried <S%H6912><s%> in Shamir. <S%H8069><s%>

After <S%H310><s%> him arose <S%H6965><s%> Jair, <S%H2971><s%> the Gileadite; <S%H1569><s%> and he judged <S%H8199><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> - two <S%H8147><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

He had thirty <S%H7970><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> who rode <S%H7392><s%> on thirty <S%H7970><s%> donkey colts, <S%H5895><s%> and they had thirty <S%H7970><s%> cities, <S%H5892><s%> which are called <S%H7121><s%> Havvoth Jair <S%H2334><s%> to this day, <S%H3117><s%> which are in the land <S%H776><s%> of Gilead. <S%H1568><s%>
Jair <S%H2971><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> and was buried <S%H6912><s%> in Kamon. <S%H7056><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> that which was evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and served <S%H5647><s%> the Baals, <S%H1168><s%> and the Ashtaroth, <S%H6252><s%> and the gods <S%H430><s%> of Syria, <S%H758><s%> and the gods <S%H430><s%> of Sidon, <S%H6721><s%> and the gods <S%H430><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> and the gods <S%H430><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%> and the gods <S%H430><s%> of the Philistines; <S%H6430><s%> and they forsook <S%H5800><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and didn't <S%H5647><s%> serve him.

The anger <S%H639><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> against Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and he sold <S%H4376><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> and into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon. <S%H5983><s%>

They troubled <S%H7492><s%> and oppressed <S%H7533><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> that year. <S%H8083><s%> For eighteen years, <S%H8141><s%> they oppressed <S%H7533><s%> all the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> that were beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> which is in Gilead. <S%H1568><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> passed over <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> also against Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and against Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> and against the house <S%H1004><s%> of Ephraim; <S%H669><s%> so that Israel <S%H3478><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> distressed. <S%H3334><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> cried <S%H2199><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "We have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against you, <S%H5800><s%> even because we have forsaken our God, <S%H430><s%> and have served <S%H5647><s%> the Baals. <S%H1168><s%>"

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> "Didn't <S%H4714><s%> I save you from the Egyptians, and from the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> from the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%> and from the Philistines? <S%H6430><s%>

The Sidonians <S%H6722><s%> also, <S%H6002><s%> and the Amalekites, and the Maonites, <S%H4584><s%> oppressed <S%H3905><s%> you; <S%H6817><s%> and you cried to me, <S%H3467><s%> and I saved you out of their hand. <S%H3027><s%>
Yet you have forsaken <S%H5800><s%> me, <S%H5647><s%> and served other <S%H312><s%> gods: <S%H430><s%> therefore I will save <S%H3467><s%> you no more. <S%H3254><s%>

Go <S%H3212><s%> and cry <S%H2199><s%> to the gods <S%H430><s%> which you have chosen. <S%H977><s%> Let them <S%H1992><s%> save <S%H3467><s%> you in the time <S%H6256><s%> of your distress! <S%H6869><s%>"

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> "We have sinned: <S%H2398><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> you to us whatever seems <S%H5869><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> to you; <S%H5337><s%> only deliver us, <S%H3117><s%> please, this day."

They put away <S%H5493><s%> the foreign <S%H5236><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> them, <S%H5647><s%> and served Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> and his soul <S%H5315><s%> was grieved <S%H7114><s%> for the misery <S%H5999><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Then the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> were gathered together, <S%H6817><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Gilead. <S%H1568><s%> The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> assembled themselves together, <S%H622><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in Mizpah. <S%H4709><s%>

The people, <S%H5971><s%> the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> said <S%H559><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to another, <S%H7453><s%> "What man <S%H376><s%> is he who will begin <S%H2490><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> against the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon? <S%H5983><s%> He shall be head <S%H7218><s%> over all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Gilead. <S%H1568><s%>"
